alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 10:13AM CST until February 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory Wednesday night, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central South Dakota, northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota. This includes the tribal lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Clay; Dickinson; O'Brien; Osceola
